name: sitgclcn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(co(c0, csitg, c1), c2), c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(co(c0, csitg, c1), c2), c3))

⊢ (w0 →((c0[sitg]c1)` c2)∈ c3)

⊣ c4 =(TopOpen ` c0)
⊣ c5 =(sigaGen ` c4)
⊣ c6 =(0 ` c0)
⊣ c7 =(× ` c0)
⊣ c8 =(RRHom `(Scalar ` c0))
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c9)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ⋃ ran(measures))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ dom((c0[sitg]c1)))
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Ban)
⊣ (w0 →(Scalar ` c0)∈ RRExt)

comment: Closure of the Bochner integral on a simple function. This version is specific to Banach spaces on the complex numbers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Feb-2018.)
